titles.title: I'm Pressing On The Upward Way (easy familiar

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord lift me up and let me stand By faith on heaven's table land A higher plane than I have found Lord plant my feet on higher ground{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm pressing on the upward way New heights I'm gaining ev'ry day Still praying as I'm onward bound Lord plant my feet on higher ground{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My heart has no desire to stay Where doubts arise and fears dismay Though some may dwell where these abound My prayer my aim is higher ground{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to live above the world Though Satan's darts at me are hurled For faith has caught the joyful sound The song of saints on higher ground{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to scale the utmost height And catch a gleam of glory bright But still I'll pray 'till heaven I've found Lord lead me on to higher ground{/lang-eng}
